mutants.mutated_line: if self.top is None and self.top.next is None:
mutants.code:
def reverse_stack(self):
    if self.top is None and self.top.next is None:
        return
    prev = None
    curr = self.top
    while curr is not None:
        next_node = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next_node
    self.top = prev

        curr = next_node
    self.top = prev

mutants.code:
def reverse_stack(self):
    if self.top is None or self.top.next is not None:
        return
    prev = None
    curr = self.top
    while curr is not None:
        next_node = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next_node
    self.top = prev
